text: Ezɨ atrivim garir provinsɨn igharazibar itir Judaba, me uaghan uarira uari akuva deravɨra ikiasa mɨghɨgha mɨsosi. Me uan apaniba ko uariv sogha uan mɨdoroziba ikarvasi. Egha gavgavigha mɨsogha egha 75,000plan gumazir men aghuazibav soghezɨma me ariaghire. Ezɨ me ariaghirezɨma me men bizitam okemezir puvatɨ.
